platforms.name: Antigravity
platforms.description: Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.
keyFeatures: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature)
Integrated Chrome browser automation
Live preview and design-to-code

platforms.name: Claude Opus 4.5
platforms.description: Claude Opus 4.5 is Anthropic's most advanced AI model, launched in November 2025 as the world's best coding model. It features sustained performance on complex, long-running tasks and agent workflows, with two operational modes: near-instant responses for quick queries and extended thinking for deep reasoning on complex problems. Its unique value is exceptional coding capabilities, advanced agentic workflows, and industry-leading safety features with constitutional AI.
keyFeatures: World's best coding model (per Anthropic)
Dual-mode: instant responses + extended thinking
200K token context window

platforms.name: LangChain 0.2
platforms.description: Major update to LangChain with improved agent capabilities, better streaming support, and enhanced tool integration for building complex AI applications.
keyFeatures: Enhanced agent capabilities
Better streaming
Improved tool integration

platforms.name: Azure AI Foundry
platforms.description: Azure AI Foundry is Microsoft's comprehensive AI development platform launched in May 2025 for building, deploying, and managing AI agents and applications. It features Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration, unified SDK combining Semantic Kernel and AutoGen, and support for Agent-to-Agent (A2A) and Model Context Protocol (MCP). Its unique value is enterprise-grade AI development with seamless Azure ecosystem integration, enabling professional developers to build sophisticated agentic applications at scale.
keyFeatures: AI Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration
Unified SDK (Semantic Kernel + AutoGen)
Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol support

platforms.name: Semantic Kernel
platforms.description: Semantic Kernel is an open-source Software Development Kit (SDK) from Microsoft that enables developers to seamlessly integrate Large Language Models (LLMs) from services like OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Hugging Face, and others into conventional programming applications (C#, Python, Java). Its key capability is providing a flexible, plugin-based architecture to orchestrate AI services, manage prompts, access native skills, and handle memory, allowing developers to build sophisticated, AI-augmented agents and copilots. It uniquely bridges the gap between traditional application logic and generative AI by treating prompts and native code as composable 'skills' or 'plugins' within a cohesive 'kernel,' making it a powerful framework for agentic and multi-step AI workflows.
keyFeatures: Multi-language SDK support (C#, Python, Java) with consistent abstractions
Planner for dynamically creating and executing multi-step AI plans/pipelines
Plugin architecture for packaging native code functions and semantic prompts as reusable skills

platforms.name: Thinking Machine Labs
platforms.description: Thinking Machine Labs is a research-driven AI company, co-founded by Mira Murati, building advanced AI systems designed for complex reasoning and problem-solving. It focuses on developing multi-modal foundation models that can understand and generate text, code, and visual data to tackle enterprise-scale challenges. The company is distinguished by its emphasis on scientific discovery and building 'generally capable' AI agents, positioning itself as a next-generation competitor in the frontier AI space.
keyFeatures: Multi-modal foundation models (text, code, vision)
Advanced reasoning and problem-solving engines
Enterprise-grade security and data governance

platforms.name: Google Workspace Studio
platforms.description: Google Workspace Studio is an AI agent builder that lets anyone create custom automation agents for Gmail, Drive, Sheets, and other Workspace apps using plain English—no coding required. Launched in December 2025 and powered by Gemini 3, it enables business users to build AI agents that handle tasks like email triage, document summarization, approval workflows, and data processing. Its unique value is democratizing AI automation with a no-code interface and deep Workspace integration.
keyFeatures: No-code AI agent builder with natural language
Deep integration with Gmail, Drive, Sheets, Docs, Calendar
Gemini 3-powered reasoning and multimodal understanding

platforms.name: Phidata
platforms.description: Phidata is an open-source framework for building robust, stateful AI Assistants that can perform actions using tools and have long-term memory via a structured knowledge base. It enables developers to create intelligent applications with persistent context, allowing assistants to remember past interactions, learn from uploaded documents, and execute tasks like data analysis or web searches. Its unique value lies in its agentic architecture that combines LLMs with a scalable postgres-based memory system, making it ideal for building production-grade, autonomous assistants.
keyFeatures: Structured memory using PostgreSQL with pgvector for long-term conversation history
Knowledge Base with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) from uploaded documents (PDF, TXT, DOCX)
Tool calling for actions like web search, data analysis (via DuckDuckGo, SQL, Python)

platforms.name: Steamship
platforms.description: Steamship is a fully managed cloud platform for building, deploying, and scaling AI applications powered by large language models (LLMs). It provides a low-code framework, multi-model support, and built-in infrastructure for stateful, persistent AI agents, enabling developers to focus on application logic rather than backend complexity. Its unique value lies in offering 'serverless AI' with automatic scaling, persistent memory for agents, and integrated tools for handling private data, file processing, and API deployment.
keyFeatures: Fully managed, auto-scaling infrastructure for LLM applications
Low-code Python framework for building stateful, persistent AI agents
Unified API for multiple LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, etc.)

platforms.name: MindStudio
platforms.description: MindStudio is a no-code platform that enables users to build, train, and deploy custom AI applications and agents. Its core capability is creating multi-step, logic-driven workflows that connect various AI models (like GPT-4, Claude, Stable Diffusion) with data sources, APIs, and human-in-the-loop steps. It uniquely targets business professionals and domain experts—not just developers—by abstracting complex AI orchestration into a visual drag-and-drop builder, allowing for rapid prototyping and deployment of enterprise-grade AI solutions.
keyFeatures: Visual, no-code workflow builder with drag-and-drop nodes for logic, AI models, and data
Integrated marketplace of pre-built AI models (OpenAI, Anthropic, Stability AI, etc.) and templates
Ability to create complex multi-agent systems with conditional logic and memory

platforms.name: MultiOn AI
platforms.description: MultiOn AI is an advanced AI agent platform that enables users to automate complex, multi-step tasks on the web through autonomous browsing and natural language commands. It allows individuals and businesses to create custom AI agents that can navigate websites, fill forms, extract data, and execute workflows without any coding. Its unique value lies in its ability to handle dynamic, stateful web interactions that traditional RPA or simple macros cannot, acting as a true 'digital employee' for web-based tasks.
keyFeatures: Autonomous web browsing with human-like interaction (clicks, scrolls, navigation)
Visual Workflow Builder for creating multi-step automation sequences
Natural language command interface (e.g., 'Book a 7 pm dinner reservation for 2 in NYC')

platforms.name: LuminaChat
platforms.description: LuminaChat is an enterprise-grade AI agent platform that enables teams to build, deploy, and manage custom AI assistants that interact with internal systems and data. Its core capability is connecting AI agents to company knowledge bases, APIs, and tools to automate complex workflows, answer questions, and perform actions. It uniquely focuses on secure, multi-agent collaboration within a governed workspace, making it distinct for internal operations and customer support teams needing auditability and control.
keyFeatures: Visual Agent Builder with no-code/low-code interface for creating custom AI agents
Secure integration with company knowledge bases (e.g., Google Drive, Confluence, Notion, SharePoint) for RAG
Ability for agents to execute custom actions via API calls to internal/external tools (Zapier, Make, custom APIs)
